text: , also known as S.S.D.FANTASICA, is a freelancer composer. He has contributed songs as a video game music composer for the Bemani division and from video games published by Nintendo such as the Super Smash Bros. series and the Pokémon crossover of the Mystery Dungeon series. ==Works== ===BEMANI=== ;Composer *Beatmania IIDX 13: DistorteD (2005) **BALLAD THE FEATHERS – with Naomi Koizumi *Beatmania IIDX 14: Gold (2006) **花吹雪〜IIDX LIMITED〜 – with ユッコ *Beatmania IIDX 15: DJ Troopers (2007) **JOURNEY TO "FANTASICA" (IIDX LIMITED) – with EMI **Claiomh Solais – with DJ Yoshitaka *Beatmania IIDX 16: Empress (2008) **BRIDAL FESTIVAL !!! – with ななっち *Beatmania IIDX 18: Resort Anthem (2010) **BLUST OF WIND **BROKEN EDEN **かげぬい ～Ver.BENIBOTAN～ *Dance Dance Revolution X2 (2010) **羽之谣 *Beatmania IIDX 19: Lincle (2011) **A MINSTREL～ver.short-scape～ **ユミル *Reflec Beat limelight (2011) **ツキミチヌ *Reflec Beat colette -Winter- (2012) **ROUND! *Reflec Beat groovin'!! (2014) **待宵草 *Reflec Beat 悠久のリフレシア (2016) **アエル ;Arranger *Pop'n music 15 Adventure (2007) **儚きは我が決意 *Pop'n music 16 Party♪ (2008) **創聖のアクエリオン *Pop'n music 18 せんごく列伝 (2010) **怒れる大きな白い馬 ～S.S.D.の役～ ;Lyricist *Beatmania IIDX 16: Empress (2008) **CaptivAte2～覚醒～ **I'm Screaming LOVE *Beatmania IIDX 17: Sirius (2009) **コスモス **かずあそび **NEW SENSATION -もう、あなたしか見えない- **NoN-Fiction Story! *Pop'n music 17 The Movie (2009) **プリズム *jubeat knit (2010) **ALL MY HEART -この恋に、わたしの全てを賭ける- *Pop'n music 19 Tune Street (2010) **～Timeless～ *Reflec Beat (2010) **少女小景再抄録 ～影～ **He is my only star *Reflec Beat limelight (2011) **limelight world *Beatmania IIDX 20: Tricoro (2012) **Re:GENERATION *Reflec Beat colette -Winter- (2012) **TAKE THE FUN ===Video Games=== ;Composition *Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team and Red Rescue Team (2005) – with Atsuhiro Ishizuna. *Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time and Explorers of Darkness (2007) – with Hideki Sakamoto, Keisuke Ito, Ryoma Nakamura, and Ken-ichi Saito. *Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky (2009) – with Hideki Sakamoto, Keisuke Ito, Ken-ichi Saito and Yoshihiro Maeda. *Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX (2020) – credited as "Original Music Composition" *Ninjala (2020) – with many others. **Far East Fighters **Dancing in the Jewelry **Spy is Coming!!! ;Arrangement *Super Smash Bros. Brawl (2008) – with many others. **The Dark World - The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past **White Land - F-Zero **Skyworld - Kid Icarus ===Albums=== *FANTASCAPE - Act.1 (2010) *ETHNOPLEX (2020) ==References== ==External links== *Arata Iiyoshi on RemyWiki.
